title: Title
about_title: Selling Computers and Renewable energy is not a simple process. Rather, it is a detailed service that includes supplying the electronic piece, delivering it to the customer, and providing the after-sales service. Furthermore, we find ourselves responsible for providing advice and assistance to the customer in choosing the equipment that fulfills their needs and aspirations.
about_body: These standards were the basics of Fanari Computers Company since its establishment in 1998. We have focused on supplying everything related to computers, accessories, and maintenance. Today, Fanari Store has become one of the leading companies in the field of computers, network equipment, points of sale, alarm systems, and telephone centers.The urgent need to shift towards cleaner and more sustainable energy sources was one of the company's goals to establish a renewable energy division in 2020 to supply and implement all photovoltaic energy projects with high quality and efficiency. Fanari Store was approved by the Energy Research Center in 2023 (Renewable Energies Support Fund) to implement photovoltaic systems projects (domestic - commercial - industrial - agricultural - services), solar heaters, and projects to raise energy efficiency.
mission_description_1: Delivering the latest devices and accessories to the local market.
mission_description_2: Achieving an integrated customer service system for electronic devices that takes into account the highest standards in storage, displaying, processing, testing, and delivering and after-sales service.
mission_description_3: Achieving a reliable and specialized maintenance service that meets our customers’ aspirations.
mission_description_4: Providing an online shopping platform that saves our customers’ time through providing the online sale service with the highest standards to cover their entire needs.
message_description_1: Upgrading the profession of selling Computers and Renewable energy to meet the international standards of professionality.
message_description_2: Contributing to the transition to a sustainable future based on clean and renewable energy sources.

description: Explore a wide range of renewable energy products, modern electronics, computers including laptops and desktops, and computer components at Veneri Store. Discover the latest technologies and devices that suit your needs, with guaranteed quality and high performance. Shop now for an easy and reliable online shopping experience.
